sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Tablet Compression Machine for production of tablets from granules.
sections.scope: Applicable to tablet manufacturing activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Inspect the turret, punches, and dies for cleanliness and damage.
Install the punches and dies as per the required tablet size.
Load the granules into the hopper and set initial weight and hardness.
Rotate the machine manually to check for smooth operation.
Power ON the machine and perform initial sampling for weight and hardness.
Adjust parameters until tablets meet specified quality standards.
Start the continuous compression process at optimal speed.
Perform in-process quality checks at regular intervals.
Collect compressed tablets in clean and labeled containers.
After completion, remove remaining granules and clean all components.
Document machine settings and total tablet count.
precautions: Never put hands inside the machine during operation.
Ensure safety guards are in place and functioning.
Monitor for punch sticking or picking during the run.
Verify weight uniformity strictly throughout the process.
